name: The First Quality Room Escape Games
name_original: The First Quality Room Escape Games
description:
Friends do you like taking up challenges in your life? Have you ever been in a mostly challenging situations ever before? If no and you like to be in one then here is your chance to be in the mostly challenging game in your life. All you need to do is solve puzzles.

Welcome to First Quality Room Escape - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with First Quality Room Escape - a cool escape game?

First Quality Room Escape is another new point and click type game, First Quality Room Escape game. In this escape game, you are locked Quality Room Try to escape from the room by finding items and by solving the puzzles. Use your best escape skills. Good luck and have fun.
